title: Professor with Most Students
description: Write a query to find the professor who teaches the most students (by number of enrollments). Display name and student_count.
hint: Join professors, courses, and enrollments. GROUP BY professor, COUNT enrollments, ORDER BY DESC, LIMIT 1.
solution: SELECT professors.name, COUNT(enrollments.enrollment_id) as student_count FROM professors INNER JOIN courses ON professors.professor_id = courses.professor_id INNER JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY professors.name ORDER BY student_count DESC LIMIT 1
